title: Britain’s Boris Johnson takes shots at E.U. leaders as tensions over ‘sausage war’ threaten message of unity
content:
1. Britain’s Boris Johnson takes shots at E.U. leaders as tensions over ‘sausage war’ threaten message of unity  The Washington Post
  2. Biden at the 2021 G7 Summit: Live updates  CNN
  3. PM wants 'pragmatism and compromise' over NI protocol  Channel 4 News
  4. Johnson wants to be Biden’s buddy. But thanks to Brexit he can never be a true ally  The Guardian
  5. Macron has told Johnson to keep his word about Brexit. The very best of luck with that  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Britain’s Boris Johnson takes shots at E.U. leaders as tensions over ‘sausage war’ threaten message of unity  The Washington Post
Biden at the 2021 G7 Summit: Live updates  CNN
PM wants 'pragmatism and compromise' over NI protocol  Channel 4 News
Johnson wants to be Biden’s buddy. But thanks to Brexit he can never be a true ally  The Guardian
Macron has told Johnson to keep his word about Brexit. The very best of luck with that  The Independent

localize.title: 英国のボリス・ジョンソン氏、EU加盟国の首脳陣を口撃 「ソーセージ戦争」をめぐる緊張感が結束のメッセージを脅かす
英国鲍里斯-约翰逊向欧盟领导人开炮，因为 "香肠战争 "的紧张局势威胁着团结的信息。
英國鮑里斯-約翰遜向歐盟領導人開炮，因爲 "香腸戰爭 "的緊張局勢威脅着團結的信息。
